additional_requirement: Focus on major documented attacks and their implications on national security.
Discuss real-world examples and preventive strategies.
Focus on the impact and effectiveness of the sanctions.
Discuss ethical concerns and civilian impact.
Focus on scenarios and prevention strategies.
